ygData.subject: Re: Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Pretty much its a one way trip into your worst nightmare.  Have you explored in there at all? On Cazic-Thule, we were killing everything including the
ygData.messageBody:
Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> That's how the Plane of Fear is now. That big gate you go in, does NOT go
> back out. One way trip. Gate or Group Gate out only.
>
> Shada
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 11:21 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
> >
> >
> > From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> > What would be nice is if you fell through the pentagram and
> > into the Plane
> > of Hate. No way back out except with a gate spell :)_
> >
> >
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> Congratulations DALMATIANRESCUE. Our latest ONElist of the week.
> To see full story and submit YOUR ONElist story, go to
> http://www.onelist.com/info/ootw_19.html
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pretty much its a one way trip into your worst nightmare. Have you
explored in there at all? On Cazic-Thule, we were killing everything
including the dracoliche, then they upgraded it. That is pretty much
the end of the story, we all got slaughtered right as we came in and
took hours to get our corpses out. "People die hard in the plane of
fear" really took its meaning.
-- Eronan
